lore: Carnages can perfectly adapt to any situation, making use of their seven limbs or their terrible jaws depending on their enemy's skill. One of them could massacre a small town without much difficulty. It is for this reason that Erebyss forbade them from getting close to civilization unless it is under the command of a person who can control them... or until she rescinds the order.\n\nThe Shadow Carnage can open portals to and from the Path of the Damned and catch its enemies by surprise.
menagerieDialog: (Even while it's not moving, its mere presence is terrifying.)
(Let's face it - there's never a time when this creature will be happy.)
(You can't help but notice that your other creatures are absolutely terrified of this one.)
(This creature's appetite is insatiable. You can't remember the last time you didn't see it devouring a giant chunk of raw, bloody meat.)
(It's sniffing at the air in search of prey. Hopefully, it doesn't find any in your castle.)
name: Shadow Carnage
